title: Ex-CIA agent convicted in Italy fights to stay in Portugal

Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
A Portuguese court official says a former CIA operative convicted of kidnapping an Egyptian cleric in Milan as part of the U.S. extraordinar... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
